titleStmt.title: The poets vvillow: or, The passionate shepheard with sundry delightfull, and no lesse passionate sonnets: describing the passions of a discontented and perplexed louer. Diuers compositions of verses concording as well with the lyricke, as the Anacreonticke measures; neuer before published ...
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Beale, for Samuel Rand, and are to be sold at his shop at Holborne bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
